name: julep (julep-ai)
description: [项目级] Deploy serverless AI workflows at scale. Firebase for AI agents。来源: https://github.com/julep-ai/julep

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Deploy serverless AI workflows at scale. Firebase for AI agents

来源: https://github.com/julep-ai/julep
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 6611

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
AGENTS.md
CHANGELOG.md
CLAUDE.md
README.md
changelog
changelog/Templates
changelog/dev
changelog/stable (main)
cookbooks
cookbooks/IDEAS.md
cookbooks/README.md
cookbooks/__init__.py
cookbooks/advanced
cookbooks/basics
deploy
deploy/.env.example
deploy/responses-build-docker-compose.yaml
deploy/simple-docker-compose.yaml
deploy/standalone-docker-compose.yaml
docker-bake.hcl

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Looking to dive deeper? The **[Julep Documentation](https://docs.julep.ai)** covers everything you need to master the platform – from core concepts (Agents, Tasks, Sessions, Tools) to advanced topics like agent memory management and architecture internals. Key resources include:

* **[Concept Guides](https://docs.julep.ai/concepts/):** Learn about Julep’s architecture, how sessions and memory work, using tools, managing long conversations, and more.
* **[API & SDK Reference](https://docs.julep.ai/api-reference/):** Find detailed reference for all SDK methods and REST API endpoints to integrate
